'''Bait-and-Switch''' is [[Yelan]]'s [[Level 4 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Separate casts of [[Lifeline]] can be used to stack this buff to maximum.
* The duration of all existing stacks is refreshed when this buff is obtained again.
* Characters' current HPs are adjusted such that they maintain the same ratio of current HP to Max HP when gaining or losing this buff.
